title: I Like Smoking Pot (A Lot)
lyrics:
Some people smoke meth
Some people smoke crack
Some people snort coke
Off a Ricky's ball sack
I've tried 'em all
Don't get me wrong

The best high there is

Comes from a bong



I like smokin' pot a lot

I like gettin' stoned alone

I like vapin' weed indeed

I think edibles are incredible

I sure love them gummy bears

Hemp shampoo for my curly hair

Rubbin' cannabis lotion on my cock

I like smokin' pot a lot



Some people like pills

Some like huffin' glue

I like marijuana

But that ain't breakin' news

Some people like booze

Some like suckin' dongs

Brother, I like both

But that's another song



I like smokin' pot a lot

I like gettin' stoned alone

I like vapin' weed indeed

I think edibles are incredible

I sure love them gummy bears

Hemp shampoo for my curly hair

Rubbin' cannabis lotion on my cock

I like smokin' pot a lot



I like smokin' pot a lot

I like gettin' stoned alone

I like vapin' weed indeed

I think edibles are incredible

I sure love them gummy bears

Hemp shampoo for my curly hair

Rubbin' cannabis lotion on my cock

I like smokin' pot

I like smokin' pot

I like smokin' pot a lot
